metadata.title: CVE-2023-49469 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: Reflected Cross Site Scripting (XSS) vulnerability in Shaarli v0.12.2,allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary code via search tag function.

criterions.comment: shaarli: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
